description:
True to his name, Phoenix rises from the ashes of death and attacks Shaka with his powerful "Phoenix Illusion." But Shaka is too strong to be affected by such powers. Shaka is, however, impressed by Phoenix`s resiliency and he offers to let him live if he leaves immediately. Phoenix refuses to leave without his friends, before they have defeated ArIes and saved Saori (Athena). So, Shaka begins attacking him again. Shaka blasts Phoenix`s bronze saint`s armour from his body and renders him utterly defenceless. Phoenix laughs at Shaka and tells him that no matter how powerful he is, his Phoenix armour can never be destroyed; it will forever rebuild itself from ruin. Shaka is quick to point out that if Phoenix dies the powers of his armour aren`t of importance. Then, Shaka opens his eyes and unleashes a demonstrative attack, which paralyses Phoenix, removes his ability to speak and strips him of his senses. Source: crunchyroll
